title: Analysis of composite sine function part - c

content.description: Let f be the function defined by f(x)=sin2x−sinx for 0 ≤ x ≤ 3π/2
content.question: Find the absolute maximum value and the absolute minimum value of f. Justify your answer.

frqParts.text: Find the absolute maximum value and the absolute minimum value of f. Justify your answer.

topic.text: 5.5: Using the Candidates Test to Determine Absolute (Global) Extrema

skill.text: Skill 1.E: Apply appropriate mathematical rules or procedures, with and without technology.
